divs: Sighting Detailsi was on my porch getting some fresh air,for some reason i started watching the sky.i was looking at the stars when i seen a very bright what i thought was a star.when i noticed it was moving i was thinking o.k it has to be a plane but it was to high to be a plane.it moved from point to point very fast zig zaging no plane can move like that.then it shot off i did not see it again,
Summary: at first it looked like a star as it got closer.it had a differant look about it.
